amendment.description: Amendment prohibits housing assistance under the bill for unauthorized aliens.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used to provide homeownership assistance for applicants described in 274A(h)(3) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1324a(h)(3)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.
